1.19.2.4.2:
• Port to 1.19.3
• Fixed stack overflow potential for recursive collisions
• Fixed reverse pickup state changes when owner is changed
1.19.2.4.1: • Added item tag list `parry:excluded_shields`, to support disabling this mod's features to otherwise compatible shield items. Mods' Shield items implementing similar rebounding mechanics also should add their shields to this ban list.
1.19.2.4:
• Mostly a direct 1.19 port!
• Minor technical improvements under the hood.
• Added `entity_type` tag list `parry:projectiles_parrying_disabled` for any modpackers wishing to disable parrying for select projectiles and allow normal shield behavior to happen instead.
• Made Rebound Enchantment obtainable on books in Enchanting Tables, added config option to force them to be treasure-only.
